channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- One Drive for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- One Drive for Android

item.title: CVE-2020-0654|2024-08-04T06:11:04.616Z -- microsoft -- one%20drive%20for%20android
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Microsoft OneDrive App for Android.This could allow an attacker to bypass the passcode or fingerprint requirements of the App.The security update addresses the vulnerability by correcting the way Microsoft OneDrive App for Android handles sharing links., aka 'Microsoft OneDrive for Android Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.
